00004 /* Master oscillator freq.       */
00005 #define FOSC (12000000)
00006 /* PLL multiplier                */
00007 #define PLL_MUL (5)
00008 /* CPU clock freq.               */

00012 #define PBSD_VAL 2
00013 /* Peripheral bus clock freq.    */
